https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/c3Ao5AJN9T5egSHfLr7b262oV7L.jpg Set in the 19th century, "Moeyo Ken" follows the life of Toshizo Hijikata (Junichi Okada). He was the vice-commander of the Shinsengumi and fought against the Meiji Restoration. --asianwiki Baragaki: Unbroken Samurai
